snippet.title: Bible X Game - Closed Beta Teaser (Christian video game)
snippet.description:
Get in on the revolution with Bible X, an open-world Christian video game of discovery. It’s the year 2072. Everything you believe in is being challenged. Are you willing to risk it all to discover the truth? One dauntless man named Hector is on a mission. His time machine, Elijah, is ready and waiting to take you on the adventure of your life.

TRY OUR EARLY DEMO ON ITCH.IO! https://biblex.itch.io/demo

Title: Jerusalem, Jerusalem
Author: Johan O. Smith | Composer: Even Skogsrud
Arrangement: Tom Schipper
Soloist: Taylor Bertelsen
©Stiftelsen Skjulte Skatters Forlag, 1929 | songtreasures.org

For more updates, check out https://biblex.io/
Subscribe to our mailing list: http://eepurl.com/hyCFmv
Meet us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6HZUmpcAkh
Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/biblexgame/

© Copyright bcc.media foundation, 2021
